crypto.name: Break PSI
crypto.desc: Trick Alice and Bob and get your flag.

crypto.name: Ed Edd n Eddy
crypto.desc:
The Eds have implemented a signature scheme system in order to know who writes what in the neighbourhood. The only problem is that now no one believes messages that are not signed! Help Ed convince Eddy to carry out his master plan, without Double D realising who is the author of the message.

Note: Eddy uses OpenSSl-based implementation of Ed448, while Edd uses WolfSSL-based implementation. Challenge inspired by AC research.

crypto.name: Guacamole
crypto.desc: I really don't understand what is the problem with choosing AES modes... Just use Guacamole mode, it's CCA secure and easy to implement!

crypto.name: Textbook
crypto.desc: My professor told me that textbook RSA signatures are not secure. Good thing this is not textbook RSA!

crypto.name: Textbook 2
crypto.desc: You will never know what comes next. Now do it without any keys! Oh and there are two masks now, good luck!

pwn.name: Build-A-Jail
pwn.desc: Tired of escaping from jails? Now you can build one using The Meson Build System.

rev.name: secret message
rev.desc: I have found this binary, but have no idea how does it work. Can you help?

rev.name: warmup
rev.desc: You should always warm up before your workout.

web.name: Curly Fries
web.desc: Welcome to Curly Fries Restaurant! We love our fries curly and we hope you will too. Just place your order, relax and watch as our team runs around the kitchen to quickly deliver your meal!
